doc.title: Massive Message
doc.plot: A package of films from schools around Birmingham. Down The Plug Hole - a dishwasher gets sucked down the plug and discovers the world of the sewers before escaping to the air. Hello, We're Aliens - an accident on a space ship sees a group of aliens gatecrash a dull birthday party for a grandmother. Head to head - a group of pupils pass visions from one to another. Granny at Face Value - an alien has a great relationship with an elderly woman until she decides to have a face lift.
